description: Aimo and Vermondo, Chased up Two Trees by Four Wild Boars, Appealing to the Virgin and Child and Saint Victor to Save Them; Attributed to Anovelo da Imbonate (Italian (Lombard), active about 1400); Milan, Lombardia, Italy; about 1400; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 25.6 x 18.4 cm (10 1/16 x 7 1/4 in.); Ms. 26, fol. 3v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
